resources.string: Hi! Welcome to WeTunes! The brand new social music player. Apart from playing your favourity music it helps you to connect and rate music amongst your friends to give you a vibrant social experience.
Since you are running this for the first time, you are being asked for these details to get registered on the server.
Add friends and view what they are listening to and whats on their mind here!
Rate the songs that you are listening
Get song suggestions from your friends and also get the top playing songs now
